DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether AG-013736 combine cisplatin gemcitabine show activity safe patient squamous type non-small cell lung cancer
DOC.brief_title: Trial Of AG-013736 , Cisplatin , And Gemcitabine For Patients With Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
